displays the ratio of a distance on the map to the corresponding
distance on the ground.","displayName":"src","methods":[],"props":{"maxWidth":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The maximum length of the scale control in pixels. Can not be changed once set. Default 100.","name":"maxWidth","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"position":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Position on the map to which the control will be added.","name":"position","required":false,"type":{"name":""top-left" | "top-right" | "bottom-left" | "bottom-right" | undefined"}},"unit":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Unit of the distance. Default metric.","name":"unit","required":false,"type":{"name":""metric" | "imperial" | "nautical" | undefined"}}}}]},{"key":"src/map/map-context.tsx","value":[{"description":"","displayName":"mapcontext","methods":[],"props":{"map":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"","name":"map","required":true,"type":{"name":"Map"}}}}]},{"key":"src/map/map.tsx","value":[{"description":"Add a map to an HTML document.","displayName":"map","methods":[],"props":{"accessToken":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Sets the map's access token.","name":"accessToken","required":true,"type":{"name":"string"}},"as":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Options common to camera animation through bounds, center, or zoom
The name of an HTML element that hosts the map; defaults to div.","name":"as","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"className":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"A class name to set on the containing DIV element.","name":"className","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"cssFile":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The MapboxGL CSS file to use. Must match the current version of the
mapbox-gl package.","name":"cssFile","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"style":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"An Object with properties to set styles on the element that contains the
map. Per React documentation customizing the appearance of React components
using "style" is not recommended. See:
https://reactjs.org/docs/dom-elements.html#style
stylesheet location","name":"style","required":false,"type":{"name":"({ [key: string]: ReactText; } & string) | ({ [key: string]: ReactText; } & Style) | undefined"}},"antialias":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, the gl context will be created with MSA antialiasing, which can be useful for antialiasing custom layers.
This is false by default as a performance optimization.","name":"antialias","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"attributionControl":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, an attribution control will be added to the map.","name":"attributionControl","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"bearing":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Sets the map's bearing (rotation). The bearing is the compass direction
that is "up"; for example, a bearing of 90° orients the map so that east is
up.","name":"bearing","required":false,"type":{"name":"(number & { bearing: number; eventData?: EventData | undefined; }) | undefined"}},"bearingSnap":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Snap to north threshold in degrees.","name":"bearingSnap","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"bounds":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The initial bounds of the map. If bounds is specified, it overrides center and zoom constructor options.
Pans and zooms the map to contain its visible area within the specified
geographical bounds. This function will also reset the map's bearing to 0
if bearing is nonzero.","name":"bounds","required":false,"type":{"name":"(LngLatBounds & { bounds: LngLatBoundsLike; eventData?: EventData | undefined; options?: (AnimationOptions & CameraOptions & { curve: number; maxDuration?: number | undefined; minZoom?: number | undefined; screenSpeed?: number | undefined; speed: number; }) | undefined; }) | ([...] & { ...; }) | ([...] & { ...; }) |..."}},"boxZoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable the "box zoom" interaction (see BoxZoomHandler)","name":"boxZoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"center":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"initial map center","name":"center","required":false,"type":{"name":"LngLat | { lng: number; lat: number; } | { lon: number; lat: number; } | [number, number] | undefined"}},"clickTolerance":{"defaultValue":{"value":"3"},"description":"The max number of pixels a user can shift the mouse pointer during a click for it to be
considered a valid click (as opposed to a mouse drag).","name":"clickTolerance","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"collectResourceTiming":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false"},"description":"If `true`, Resource Timing API information will be collected for requests made by GeoJSON
and Vector Tile web workers (this information is normally inaccessible from the main
Javascript thread). Information will be returned in a `resourceTiming` property of
relevant `data` events.","name":"collectResourceTiming","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"crossSourceCollisions":{"defaultValue":{"value":"true"},"description":"If `true`, symbols from multiple sources can collide with each other during collision
detection. If `false`, collision detection is run separately for the symbols in each source.","name":"crossSourceCollisions","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"customAttribution":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"String or strings to show in an AttributionControl.
Only applicable if options.attributionControl is `true`.","name":"customAttribution","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | string[] | undefined"}},"dragPan":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable the "drag to pan" interaction (see DragPanHandler).","name":"dragPan","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"dragRotate":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable the "drag to rotate" interaction (see DragRotateHandler).","name":"dragRotate","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"doubleClickZoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable the "double click to zoom" interaction (see DoubleClickZoomHandler).","name":"doubleClickZoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"hash":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If `true`, the map's position (zoom, center latitude, center longitude, bearing, and pitch) will be synced with the hash fragment of the page's URL.
For example, `http://path/to/my/page.html#2.59/39.26/53.07/-24.1/60`.
An additional string may optionally be provided to indicate a parameter-styled hash,
e.g. http://path/to/my/page.html#map=2.59/39.26/53.07/-24.1/60&foo=bar, where foo
is a custom parameter and bar is an arbitrary hash distinct from the map hash.","name":"hash","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | boolean | undefined"}},"fadeDuration":{"defaultValue":{"value":"300"},"description":"Controls the duration of the fade-in/fade-out animation for label collisions, in milliseconds.
This setting affects all symbol layers. This setting does not affect the duration of runtime
styling transitions or raster tile cross-fading.","name":"fadeDuration","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, map creation will fail if the implementation determines that the performance of the created WebGL context would be dramatically lower than expected.","name":"failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"fitBoundsOptions":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"A fitBounds options object to use only when setting the bounds option.","name":"fitBoundsOptions","required":false,"type":{"name":"FitBoundsOptions | undefined"}},"interactive":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If false, no mouse, touch, or keyboard listeners are attached to the map, so it will not respond to input","name":"interactive","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"keyboard":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable keyboard shortcuts (see KeyboardHandler).","name":"keyboard","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"locale":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"A patch to apply to the default localization table for UI strings, e.g. control tooltips.
The `locale` object maps namespaced UI string IDs to translated strings in the target language;
see `src/ui/default_locale.js` for an example with all supported string IDs.
The object may specify all UI strings (thereby adding support for a new translation) or
only a subset of strings (thereby patching the default translation table).","name":"locale","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ [key: string]: string; } | undefined"}},"localIdeographFontFamily":{"defaultValue":{"value":"null"},"description":"If specified, defines a CSS font-family for locally overriding generation of glyphs in the
'CJK Unified Ideographs' and 'Hangul Syllables' ranges. In these ranges, font settings from
the map's style will be ignored, except for font-weight keywords (light/regular/medium/bold).
The purpose of this option is to avoid bandwidth-intensive glyph server requests.","name":"localIdeographFontFamily","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"logoPosition":{"defaultValue":{"value":""bottom-left""},"description":"A string representing the position of the Mapbox wordmark on the map.","name":"logoPosition","required":false,"type":{"name":""top-left" | "top-right" | "bottom-left" | "bottom-right" | undefined"}},"maxBounds":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If set, the map is constrained to the given bounds.
The map will be constrained to the given bounds.","name":"maxBounds","required":false,"type":{"name":"LngLatBounds | [LngLatLike, LngLatLike] | [number, number, number, number] | undefined"}},"maxPitch":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Maximum pitch of the map","name":"maxPitch","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"maxZoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Maximum zoom of the map
The maximum zoom level of the map (0-24).","name":"maxZoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"minPitch":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Minimum pitch of the map","name":"minPitch","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"minZoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Minimum zoom of the map
The minimum zoom level of the map (0-24).","name":"minZoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"preserveDrawingBuffer":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, The maps canvas can be exported to a PNG using map.getCanvas().toDataURL();. This is false by default as a performance optimization.","name":"preserveDrawingBuffer","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"pitch":{"defaultValue":{"value":"0"},"description":"The initial pitch (tilt) of the map, measured in degrees away from the plane of the
screen (0-60).
Sets the map's pitch (tilt).","name":"pitch","required":false,"type":{"name":"(number & { pitch: number; eventData?: EventData | undefined; }) | undefined"}},"pitchWithRotate":{"defaultValue":{"value":"true"},"description":"If `false`, the map's pitch (tilt) control with "drag to rotate" interaction will be disabled.","name":"pitchWithRotate","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"refreshExpiredTiles":{"defaultValue":{"value":"true"},"description":"If `false`, the map won't attempt to re-request tiles once they expire per their HTTP
`cacheControl`/`expires` headers.","name":"refreshExpiredTiles","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"renderWorldCopies":{"defaultValue":{"value":"true"},"description":"If `true`, multiple copies of the world will be rendered, when zoomed out.
If true:
- multiple copies of the world will be rendered side by side beyond -180
   and 180 degrees longitude.
If set to false:
- When the map is zoomed out far enough that a single representation of the
   world does not fill the map's entire container, there will be blank space
   beyond 180 and -180 degrees longitude.
- Features that cross 180 and -180 degrees longitude will be cut in two
   (with one portion on the right edge of the map and the other on the left
   edge of the map) at every zoom level.","name":"renderWorldCopies","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"scrollZoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable the "scroll to zoom" interaction","name":"scrollZoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"trackResize":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If  true, the map will automatically resize when the browser window resizes","name":"trackResize","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"transformRequest":{"defaultValue":{"value":"null"},"description":"A callback run before the Map makes a request for an external URL. The callback can be
used to modify the url, set headers, or set the credentials property for cross-origin requests.","name":"transformRequest","required":false,"type":{"name":"TransformRequestFunction | undefined"}},"touchZoomRotate":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true, enable the "pinch to rotate and zoom" interaction (see TouchZoomRotateHandler).","name":"touchZoomRotate","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"zoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Initial zoom level","name":"zoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"maxTileCacheSize":{"defaultValue":{"value":"null"},"description":"The maximum number of tiles stored in the tile cache for a given source. If omitted, the
cache will be dynamically sized based on the current viewport.","name":"maxTileCacheSize","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"ease":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Changes any combination of center, zoom, bearing, and pitch, with an
animated transition between old and new values. The map will retain its
current values for any details not specified in options.","name":"ease","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ eventData?: EventData | undefined; options: CameraOptions | (CameraOptions & AnimationOptions); } | undefined"}},"fly":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Changes any combination of center, zoom, bearing, and pitch, animating the
transition along a curve that evokes flight. The animation seamlessly
incorporates zooming and panning to help the user maintain her bearings
even after traversing a great distance.","name":"fly","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ eventData?: EventData | undefined; options: CameraOptions | (CameraOptions & AnimationOptions) | (CameraOptions & AnimationOptions & { curve: number; maxDuration?: number | undefined; minZoom?: number | undefined; screenSpeed?: number | undefined; speed: number; }); } | undefined"}},"images":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"These images will be available to the style. Images can be displayed on the
map like any other icon in the style's sprite using an image's ID with
icon-image, background-pattern, fill-pattern, or line-pattern. A Map error
event will be fired if there is not enough space in the sprite to add an
image.","name":"images","required":false,"type":{"name":"[{ name: string; image: HTMLImageElement | ArrayBufferView | { width: number; height: number; data: Uint8Array | Uint8ClampedArray; } | ImageData; options?: { pixelRatio?: number | undefined; sdf?: boolean | undefined; } | undefined; }] | undefined"}},"jump":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Changes any combination of center, zoom, bearing, and pitch, without an
animated transition. The map will retain its current values for any details
not specified in options.","name":"jump","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ eventData?: EventData | undefined; options: CameraOptions; } | undefined"}},"light":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Sets the any combination of light values.","name":"light","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ options: Light; lightOptions?: any; } | undefined"}},"repaint":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Gets and sets a Boolean indicating whether the map will continuously
repaint. This information is useful for analyzing performance.","name":"repaint","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"rotate":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Rotates the map to the specified bearing, with an animated transition. The
bearing is the compass direction that is "up"; for example, a bearing of
90° orients the map so that east is up.","name":"rotate","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ bearing: number; eventData?: EventData | undefined; options?: AnimationOptions | undefined; } | undefined"}},"screen":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Pans, rotates and zooms the map to to fit the box made by points p0 and p1
once the map is rotated to the specified bearing. To zoom without rotating,
pass in the current map bearing.","name":"screen","required":false,"type":{"name":"{ p0: PointLike; p1: PointLike; bearing: number; eventData?: EventData | undefined; options?: { easing?: ((time: number) => number) | undefined; linear: number; maxZoom?: number | undefined; offset: PointLike; padding?: number | ... 1 more ... | undefined; } | undefined; } | undefined"}},"showCollisionBoxes":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Gets and sets a Boolean indicating whether the map will render boxes around
all symbols in the data source, revealing which symbols were rendered or
which were hidden due to collisions. This information is useful for
debugging.","name":"showCollisionBoxes","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"showTileBoundaries":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Gets and sets a Boolean indicating whether the map will render an outline
around each tile and the tile ID. These tile boundaries are useful for
debugging.

The uncompressed file size of the first vector source is drawn in the top
left corner of each tile, next to the tile ID.","name":"showTileBoundaries","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"styleMbx":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The map's Mapbox style. This must be an a JSON object conforming to the
schema described in the Mapbox Style Specification, or a URL to such JSON.","name":"styleMbx","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | Style | { style: string | Style; options?: { diff?: boolean | undefined; localIdeographFontFamily?: string | undefined; } | undefined; } | undefined"}},"onBoxzoomcancel":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "box zoom" interaction ends.","name":"onBoxzoomcancel","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapBoxZoomEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onBoxzoomend":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "box zoom" interaction ends.","name":"onBoxzoomend","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapBoxZoomEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onBoxzoomstart":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "box zoom" interaction starts.","name":"onBoxzoomstart","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapBoxZoomEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onClick":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is pressed and released at
the same point on the map.","name":"onClick","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onContextmenu":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the right button of the mouse is clicked or the context menu key
is pressed within the map.","name":"onContextmenu","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onData":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when any map data loads or changes.","name":"onData","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapDataEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onDataloading":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when any map data (style, source, tile, etc) begins loading or
changing asynchronously. All dataloading events are followed by a data or
error event.","name":"onDataloading","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapDataEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onDblclick":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is clicked twice at the same
point on the map.","name":"onDblclick","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onDrag":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired repeatedly during a "drag to pan" interaction..","name":"onDrag","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onDragend":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "drag to pan" interaction ends.","name":"onDragend","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onDragstart":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "drag to pan" interaction starts.","name":"onDragstart","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onError":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when an error occurs. This is GL JS's primary error reporting
mechanism. We use an event instead of throw to better accommodate
asyncronous operations. If no listeners are bound to the error event, the
error will be printed to the console.","name":"onError","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: { error: { message: string; }; }) => void) | undefined"}},"onIdle":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired after the last frame rendered before the map enters an "idle" state:
no camera transitions are in progress, all currently requested tiles have
loaded, all fade/transition animations have completed.","name":"onIdle","required":false,"type":{"name":"(() => void) | undefined"}},"onLoad":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired immediately after all necessary resources have been downloaded and
the first visually complete rendering of the map has occurred.","name":"onLoad","required":false,"type":{"name":"(() => void) | undefined"}},"onMousedown":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is pressed within the map.","name":"onMousedown","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onMousemove":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is moved within the map.","name":"onMousemove","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onMouseout":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a point device (usually a mouse) leaves the map's canvas.","name":"onMouseout","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onMouseover":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is moved within the map.","name":"onMouseover","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onMouseup":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is released within the map.","name":"onMouseup","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapMouseEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onMove":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired repeatedly during an animated transition from one view to another, as
the result of either user interaction or a fly transition.","name":"onMove","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | WheelEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onMoveend":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired just after the map completes a transition from one view to another,

interaction or a fly transition.","name":"onPitch","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onPitchend":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired whenever the map's pitch (tilt) finishes changing as the result of
either user interaction or a fly transition.","name":"onPitchend","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: EventData) => void) | undefined"}},"onPitchstart":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired whenever the map's pitch (tilt) begins a change as the result of
either user interaction or a fly transition.","name":"onPitchstart","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: EventData) => void) | undefined"}},"onRemove":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired immediately after the map has been removed.","name":"onRemove","required":false,"type":{"name":"(() => void) | undefined"}},"onRender":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired whenever the map is drawn to the screen, as the result of: a change
to the map's position, zoom, pitch, or bearing; a change to the map's
style; a change to a GeoJSON source; the loading of a vector tile, GeoJSON
file, glyph, or sprite.","name":"onRender","required":false,"type":{"name":"(() => void) | undefined"}},"onResize":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired immediately after the map has been resized.","name":"onResize","required":false,"type":{"name":"(() => void) | undefined"}},"onRotate":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired repeatedly during a "drag to rotate" interaction.","name":"onRotate","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onRotateend":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "drag to rotate" interaction ends.","name":"onRotateend","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onRotatestart":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when a "drag to rotate" interaction starts.","name":"onRotatestart","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapboxEvent<MouseEvent | TouchEvent | undefined>) => void) | undefined"}},"onSourcedata":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when one of the map's sources loads or changes, including if a tile
belonging to a source loads or changes.","name":"onSourcedata","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapSourceDataEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onSourcedataloading":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when one of the map's sources begins loading or changing
asynchronously. All sourcedataloading events are followed by a sourcedata
or error event.","name":"onSourcedataloading","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapSourceDataEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onStyledata":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the map's style loads or changes.","name":"onStyledata","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapStyleDataEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onStyledataloading":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the map's style begins loading or changing asynchronously. All
styledataloading events are followed by a styledata or error event.","name":"onStyledataloading","required":false,"type":{"name":"((data: MapStyleDataEvent) => void) | undefined"}},"onStyleimagemissing":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when an icon or pattern needed by the style is missing. At zoom levels equal to or
greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.","name":"maxZoom","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"metadata":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Arbitrary properties useful to track with the layer, but do not influence
rendering. Properties should be prefixed to avoid collisions, like
'mapbox:'.","name":"metadata","required":false,"type":{"name":"any"}},"minZoom":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The minimum zoom level (0 - 24) for the layer. At zoom levels less than the

Required for vector tile sources;

Can't be changed once set.","name":"color","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"draggable":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Indicates if a marker can be dragged to a new location on the map.","name":"draggable","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}},"location":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Set the marker's geographical position and move it.","name":"location","required":false,"type":{"name":"[number, number] | GeoPoint | undefined"}},"offset":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The offset in pixels to apply relative to the element's center. Negative
values indicate left and up.","name":"offset","required":false,"type":{"name":"[number, number] | Point | undefined"}},"onClick":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the marker is clicked.","name":"onClick","required":false,"type":{"name":"EventHandler | undefined"}},"onDrag":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired while dragging.","name":"onDrag","required":false,"type":{"name":"EventHandler | undefined"}},"onDragend":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the marker is finished being dragged.","name":"onDragend","required":false,"type":{"name":"DragHandler | undefined"}},"onDragstart":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when dragging starts.","name":"onDragstart","required":false,"type":{"name":"DragHandler | undefined"}},"onMouseenter":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the mouse enters the marker.","name":"onMouseenter","required":false,"type":{"name":"EventHandler | undefined"}},"onMouseleave":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Fired when the mouse exits the marker.","name":"onMouseleave","required":false,"type":{"name":"EventHandler | undefined"}},"popup":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Options that will be used to create a popup for this marker.","name":"popup","required":false,"type":{"name":"MarkerPopup | undefined"}},"togglePopup":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"If true the popup will be shown.","name":"togglePopup","required":false,"type":{"name":"boolean | undefined"}}}}]},{"key":"src/map/component/scale/scale.tsx","value":[{"description":"Scale displays the ratio of a distance on the map to the corresponding
